1984.overview: After taking a wrong turn, a young man somehow falls into a mysterious cave and becomes hopelessly lost. As he searches for a way out, the journey he experiences forces him to confront the deepest parts of himself.
1984.title: The Experiencer

1984.overview: A pastor and a teacher, two pillars of the small community of Triune, share a dark and unspeakable secret: the common enemy of an ancient demonic terror deigns to destroy one through the other during the Devil's hour.
1984.title: The Devil's Hour

Despite the fact that he is studying at a demanding grammar school, he is maybe the most traveling and definitely the most watched climber of today.  It is almost an impossible task to combine and manage top sporting performances on the rocks, a difficult studying and the never ending carousel of competitions, interviews, festivals and slide-shows.  Adam is taking his A level exams in a few weeks. Even though he is a top student, he decides not to go to university. Instead, he and 3 of his friends are setting on a long journey to the unknown north of Europe. Remote areas of Norway and Sweden are hiding some undiscovered climbing and natural treasures.  The first really FREE journey beyond the limits of human possibilities may begin...
1987.title: Change

1987.original_title: TOMORROW X TOGETHER: OUR LOST SUMMER
1987.overview: TOMORROW X TOGETHER are back post-pandemic and are ready to embark on their first world tour from Seoul to North America. The band's nerves and excitement are kicking in, but they have challenged themselves to give the performance of a lifetime.
1987.title: TOMORROW X TOGETHER: OUR LOST SUMMER

1987.original_title: Luccas Neto em: Acampamento de Férias 3
1987.overview: Luccas and Gi are separated for the first time in a competition at the camp. The girls and boys face off in a Talent Show for a spot in a real pop band. The trolling begins! Who's gonna do it best?
1987.title: Luccas Neto in: Summer Camp 3

1988.overview: An ordinary taxi driver has his life turned upside down by picking up an elegant old lady.
1988.title: Taxi

1988.overview: After taking a wrong turn, a young man somehow falls into a mysterious cave and becomes hopelessly lost. As he searches for a way out, the journey he experiences forces him to confront the deepest parts of himself.
1988.title: The Experiencer

1988.overview: A pastor and a teacher, two pillars of the small community of Triune, share a dark and unspeakable secret: the common enemy of an ancient demonic terror deigns to destroy one through the other during the Devil's hour.
1988.title: The Devil's Hour

1988.original_title: The 1st 13th Annual Fancy Anvil Awards Show Program Special: Live in Stereo
1988.overview: Cartoon Network holds an awards show awarding cartoon excellence.
1988.title: The 1st 13th Annual Fancy Anvil Awards Show Program Special: Live in Stereo

1988.original_title: Vanessa da Mata: Caixinha de Música Ao Vivo
1988.overview: Vanessa da Mata presents her newest project "Caixinha de Música". Recorded at the Teatro Natura in São Pualo, the project is the second DVD of her career and brings a new musical concept for the singer, in which she brings interference from electronic music incorporating the organic sound of a trio of musicians.
1988.title: Vanessa da Mata: Caixinha de Música Ao Vivo

1988.original_title: Linkin Park and Friends - Celebrate Life in Honor of Chester Bennington
1988.overview: The tribute concert in memory of Chester Bennington at Hollywood Bowl in Los Angeles.
1988.title: Linkin Park and Friends - Celebrate Life in Honor of Chester Bennington

1988.overview: Danny and older sister Eleanor fall into the adventure of a lifetime when Danny accidentally unleashes a centuries old curse involving mummies, pharaohs and nefarious villains!  When their archaeologist parents go on an expedition to an ancient pharaoh's last resting place, Danny sneaks into the tomb and finds a sacred amulet, which he takes home.  When he accidentally breaks the amulet, all sorts of chaos follows,starting with his parents turning into mummies!  Eleanor and Danny frantically look for clues to solve this nightmare but the police, and evil assistance, and a mysterious visitor from the past are suddenly getting too close for comfort.
1988.title: Under Wraps

1988.overview: "Jennifer Lopez: All I Have" was the first concert residency by American entertainer Jennifer Lopez. Performed at Zappos Theater (formerly The AXIS Theater) located in the Planet Hollywood Resort & Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, the residency began on January 20, 2016 and concluded on September 29, 2018. The show has received critical acclaim for its production and Lopez's showmanship. The residency grossed $101.9 million after 120 shows, making it the sixth highest-grossing Las Vegas residency of all time, and the top residency by a Latin artist.
1988.title: Jennifer Lopez | All I Have

1988.overview: GAMERA is a kaiju short film first released as a celebration of the 50th anniversary of Gamera's debut film.
1988.title: Gamera

1988.overview: A retired FBI profiler is called in on a last case - only to find himself at the mercy of a teenage killer's deadly game. He must use all his skills and experience to save lives, including his own.
1988.title: Profile of a Killer

1988.overview: Live Gothic is the title of a live album recorded in Poland by Swedish symphonic metal band Therion released on July 25, 2008. The album is released on two CDs and one DVD.
1988.title: Therion: Live Gothic

1988.overview: A short documentary, done by John Marsh and Kelly Curtis, explores Curtis’ relationship to the Halloween franchise. Called “The Night She Came Home”, this featurette follows her as she attends a HorrorHound sponsored signing in 2012 meant to raise money for charity.
1988.title: The Night She Came Home!!

1988.overview: Documentary exploring the subject of the existence of the afterlife based on 12 years of research conducted by doctors, PhDs, and research scientists.
1988.title: Ghosts and the Afterlife

1988.original_title: 2017 BTS Live Trilogy Episode III (Final Chapter): The Wings Tour in Seoul
1988.overview: The second worldwide concert tour headlined by the South Korean boy band BTS to promote their second Korean studio album, Wings.
1988.title: 2017 BTS Live Trilogy Episode III (Final Chapter): The Wings Tour in Seoul

1988.original_title: Notre Dame de Paris - Live Arena di Verona
1988.overview: Notre Dame de Paris tells the story of Quasimodo, the hunchbacked bell-ringer of the cathedral of Notre-Dame and of his impossible and tragic love for Esmeralda, a beautiful gypsy. A love condemned by injustice and hypocrisy. Quasimodo forced by his ugliness to look at the world from the top of a tower one day he falls madly in love with Esmeralda who sees dancing and singing on the square in front of the cathedral. But Esmeralda is in love with Febo, the handsome captain of the King's guards. Febo is fiancé of Fiordaliso, a young and rich bourgeois, but the exotic and sensual beauty of the gypsy does not leave indifferent the man who immediately falls in love with her. Even Frollo, the archdeacon of the cathedral, is attracted by the gypsy and spying on the moves of the two lovers in a raptus of jealousy and repressed carnal desire to get rid of the rival stabbing Febo behind.
1988.title: Notre Dame de Paris - Live Arena di Verona

1992.original_title: Notre Dame de Paris - Live Arena di Verona
1992.overview: Notre Dame de Paris tells the story of Quasimodo, the hunchbacked bell-ringer of the cathedral of Notre-Dame and of his impossible and tragic love for Esmeralda, a beautiful gypsy. A love condemned by injustice and hypocrisy. Quasimodo forced by his ugliness to look at the world from the top of a tower one day he falls madly in love with Esmeralda who sees dancing and singing on the square in front of the cathedral. But Esmeralda is in love with Febo, the handsome captain of the King's guards. Febo is fiancé of Fiordaliso, a young and rich bourgeois, but the exotic and sensual beauty of the gypsy does not leave indifferent the man who immediately falls in love with her. Even Frollo, the archdeacon of the cathedral, is attracted by the gypsy and spying on the moves of the two lovers in a raptus of jealousy and repressed carnal desire to get rid of the rival stabbing Febo behind.
1992.title: Notre Dame de Paris - Live Arena di Verona

1992.overview: Adam Ondra has been considered the best climber in the history of climbing for several years now. Even though he is only 19. Despite the fact that he is studying at a demanding grammar school, he is maybe the most traveling and definitely the most watched climber of today.  It is almost an impossible task to combine and manage top sporting performances on the rocks, a difficult studying and the never ending carousel of competitions, interviews, festivals and slide-shows.  Adam is taking his A level exams in a few weeks. Even though he is a top student, he decides not to go to university. Instead, he and 3 of his friends are setting on a long journey to the unknown north of Europe. Remote areas of Norway and Sweden are hiding some undiscovered climbing and natural treasures.  The first really FREE journey beyond the limits of human possibilities may begin...
1992.title: Change

1992.original_title: TOMORROW X TOGETHER: OUR LOST SUMMER
1992.overview: TOMORROW X TOGETHER are back post-pandemic and are ready to embark on their first world tour from Seoul to North America. The band's nerves and excitement are kicking in, but they have challenged themselves to give the performance of a lifetime.
1992.title: TOMORROW X TOGETHER: OUR LOST SUMMER

1992.title: Luccas Neto in: Summer Camp 3

1993.overview: An ordinary taxi driver has his life turned upside down by picking up an elegant old lady.
1993.title: Taxi

1993.title: The Experiencer

1993.title: The Devil's Hour

1993.original_title: Vanessa da Mata: Caixinha de Música Ao Vivo
1993.overview: Vanessa da Mata presents her newest project "Caixinha de Música". Recorded at the Teatro Natura in São Pualo, the project is the second DVD of her career and brings a new musical concept for the singer, in which she brings interference from electronic music incorporating the organic sound of a trio of musicians.
1993.title: Vanessa da Mata: Caixinha de Música Ao Vivo

1993.original_title: Linkin Park and Friends - Celebrate Life in Honor of Chester Bennington
1993.overview: The tribute concert in memory of Chester Bennington at Hollywood Bowl in Los Angeles.
1993.title: Linkin Park and Friends - Celebrate Life in Honor of Chester Bennington

1993.overview: Danny and older sister Eleanor fall into the adventure of a lifetime when Danny accidentally unleashes a centuries old curse involving mummies, pharaohs and nefarious villains!  When their archaeologist parents go on an expedition to an ancient pharaoh's last resting place, Danny sneaks into the tomb and finds a sacred amulet, which he takes home.  When he accidentally breaks the amulet, all sorts of chaos follows,starting with his parents turning into mummies!  Eleanor and Danny frantically look for clues to solve this nightmare but the police, and evil assistance, and a mysterious visitor from the past are suddenly getting too close for comfort.
1993.title: Under Wraps

1993.overview: "Jennifer Lopez: All I Have" was the first concert residency by American entertainer Jennifer Lopez. Performed at Zappos Theater (formerly The AXIS Theater) located in the Planet Hollywood Resort & Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, the residency began on January 20, 2016 and concluded on September 29, 2018. The show has received critical acclaim for its production and Lopez's showmanship. The residency grossed $101.9 million after 120 shows, making it the sixth highest-grossing Las Vegas residency of all time, and the top residency by a Latin artist.
1993.title: Jennifer Lopez | All I Have

1997.overview: Danny and older sister Eleanor fall into the adventure of a lifetime when Danny accidentally unleashes a centuries old curse involving mummies, pharaohs and nefarious villains!  When their archaeologist parents go on an expedition to an ancient pharaoh's last resting place, Danny sneaks into the tomb and finds a sacred amulet, which he takes home.  When he accidentally breaks the amulet, all sorts of chaos follows,starting with his parents turning into mummies!  Eleanor and Danny frantically look for clues to solve this nightmare but the police, and evil assistance, and a mysterious visitor from the past are suddenly getting too close for comfort.
1997.title: Under Wraps

1997.overview: "Jennifer Lopez: All I Have" was the first concert residency by American entertainer Jennifer Lopez. Performed at Zappos Theater (formerly The AXIS Theater) located in the Planet Hollywood Resort & Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, the residency began on January 20, 2016 and concluded on September 29, 2018. The show has received critical acclaim for its production and Lopez's showmanship. The residency grossed $101.9 million after 120 shows, making it the sixth highest-grossing Las Vegas residency of all time, and the top residency by a Latin artist.
1997.title: Jennifer Lopez | All I Have

1997.original_title: Notre Dame de Paris - Live Arena di Verona
1997.overview: Notre Dame de Paris tells the story of Quasimodo, the hunchbacked bell-ringer of the cathedral of Notre-Dame and of his impossible and tragic love for Esmeralda, a beautiful gypsy. A love condemned by injustice and hypocrisy. Quasimodo forced by his ugliness to look at the world from the top of a tower one day he falls madly in love with Esmeralda who sees dancing and singing on the square in front of the cathedral. But Esmeralda is in love with Febo, the handsome captain of the King's guards. Febo is fiancé of Fiordaliso, a young and rich bourgeois, but the exotic and sensual beauty of the gypsy does not leave indifferent the man who immediately falls in love with her. Even Frollo, the archdeacon of the cathedral, is attracted by the gypsy and spying on the moves of the two lovers in a raptus of jealousy and repressed carnal desire to get rid of the rival stabbing Febo behind.
1997.title: Notre Dame de Paris - Live Arena di Verona

1997.overview: Adam Ondra has been considered the best climber in the history of climbing for several years now. Even though he is only 19. Despite the fact that he is studying at a demanding grammar school, he is maybe the most traveling and definitely the most watched climber of today.  It is almost an impossible task to combine and manage top sporting performances on the rocks, a difficult studying and the never ending carousel of competitions, interviews, festivals and slide-shows.  Adam is taking his A level exams in a few weeks. Even though he is a top student, he decides not to go to university. Instead, he and 3 of his friends are setting on a long journey to the unknown north of Europe. Remote areas of Norway and Sweden are hiding some undiscovered climbing and natural treasures.  The first really FREE journey beyond the limits of human possibilities may begin...
1997.title: Change

1997.original_title: TOMORROW X TOGETHER: OUR LOST SUMMER
1997.overview: TOMORROW X TOGETHER are back post-pandemic and are ready to embark on their first world tour from Seoul to North America. The band's nerves and excitement are kicking in, but they have challenged themselves to give the performance of a lifetime.
1997.title: TOMORROW X TOGETHER: OUR LOST SUMMER

1997.title: Luccas Neto in: Summer Camp 3

2011.overview: Danny and older sister Eleanor fall into the adventure of a lifetime when Danny accidentally unleashes a centuries old curse involving mummies, pharaohs and nefarious villains!  When their archaeologist parents go on an expedition to an ancient pharaoh's last resting place, Danny sneaks into the tomb and finds a sacred amulet, which he takes home.  When he accidentally breaks the amulet, all sorts of chaos follows,starting with his parents turning into mummies!  Eleanor and Danny frantically look for clues to solve this nightmare but the police, and evil assistance, and a mysterious visitor from the past are suddenly getting too close for comfort.
2011.title: Under Wraps

2011.original_title: Notre Dame de Paris - Live Arena di Verona
2011.overview: Notre Dame de Paris tells the story of Quasimodo, the hunchbacked bell-ringer of the cathedral of Notre-Dame and of his impossible and tragic love for Esmeralda, a beautiful gypsy. A love condemned by injustice and hypocrisy. Quasimodo forced by his ugliness to look at the world from the top of a tower one day he falls madly in love with Esmeralda who sees dancing and singing on the square in front of the cathedral. But Esmeralda is in love with Febo, the handsome captain of the King's guards. Febo is fiancé of Fiordaliso, a young and rich bourgeois, but the exotic and sensual beauty of the gypsy does not leave indifferent the man who immediately falls in love with her. Even Frollo, the archdeacon of the cathedral, is attracted by the gypsy and spying on the moves of the two lovers in a raptus of jealousy and repressed carnal desire to get rid of the rival stabbing Febo behind.
2011.title: Notre Dame de Paris - Live Arena di Verona

2011.overview: Adam Ondra has been considered the best climber in the history of climbing for several years now. Even though he is only 19. Despite the fact that he is studying at a demanding grammar school, he is maybe the most traveling and definitely the most watched climber of today.  It is almost an impossible task to combine and manage top sporting performances on the rocks, a difficult studying and the never ending carousel of competitions, interviews, festivals and slide-shows.  Adam is taking his A level exams in a few weeks. Even though he is a top student, he decides not to go to university. Instead, he and 3 of his friends are setting on a long journey to the unknown north of Europe. Remote areas of Norway and Sweden are hiding some undiscovered climbing and natural treasures.  The first really FREE journey beyond the limits of human possibilities may begin...
2011.title: Change

2011.original_title: TOMORROW X TOGETHER: OUR LOST SUMMER
2011.overview: TOMORROW X TOGETHER are back post-pandemic and are ready to embark on their first world tour from Seoul to North America. The band's nerves and excitement are kicking in, but they have challenged themselves to give the performance of a lifetime.
2011.title: TOMORROW X TOGETHER: OUR LOST SUMMER

2015.overview: Adam Ondra has been considered the best climber in the history of climbing for several years now. Even though he is only 19. Performed at Zappos Theater (formerly The AXIS Theater) located in the Planet Hollywood Resort & Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, the residency began on January 20, 2016 and concluded on September 29, 2018. The show has received critical acclaim for its production and Lopez's showmanship. The residency grossed $101.9 million after 120 shows, making it the sixth highest-grossing Las Vegas residency of all time, and the top residency by a Latin artist.
2020.title: Jennifer Lopez | All I Have

2020.overview: GAMERA is a kaiju short film first released as a celebration of the 50th anniversary of Gamera's debut film.
2020.title: Gamera

2020.overview: A retired FBI profiler is called in on a last case - only to find himself at the mercy of a teenage killer's deadly game. He must use all his skills and experience to save lives, including his own.
2020.title: Profile of a Killer

2020.overview: Live Gothic is the title of a live album recorded in Poland by Swedish symphonic metal band Therion released on July 25, 2008. The album is released on two CDs and one DVD.
2020.title: Therion: Live Gothic

2020.overview: A short documentary, done by John Marsh and Kelly Curtis, explores Curtis’ relationship to the Halloween franchise. Called “The Night She Came Home”, this featurette follows her as she attends a HorrorHound sponsored signing in 2012 meant to raise money for charity.
2020.title: The Night She Came Home!!

2020.overview: Documentary exploring the subject of the existence of the afterlife based on 12 years of research conducted by doctors, PhDs, and research scientists.
2020.title: Ghosts and the Afterlife

2020.overview: The second worldwide concert tour headlined by the South Korean boy band BTS to promote their second Korean studio album, Wings.
2020.title: 2017 BTS Live Trilogy Episode III (Final Chapter): The Wings Tour in Seoul

2020.original_title: Notre Dame de Paris - Live Arena di Verona
2020.overview: Notre Dame de Paris tells the story of Quasimodo, the hunchbacked bell-ringer of the cathedral of Notre-Dame and of his impossible and tragic love for Esmeralda, a beautiful gypsy. A love condemned by injustice and hypocrisy. Quasimodo forced by his ugliness to look at the world from the top of a tower one day he falls madly in love with Esmeralda who sees dancing and singing on the square in front of the cathedral. But Esmeralda is in love with Febo, the handsome captain of the King's guards. Febo is fiancé of Fiordaliso, a young and rich bourgeois, but the exotic and sensual beauty of the gypsy does not leave indifferent the man who immediately falls in love with her. Even Frollo, the archdeacon of the cathedral, is attracted by the gypsy and spying on the moves of the two lovers in a raptus of jealousy and repressed carnal desire to get rid of the rival stabbing Febo behind.
2020.title: Notre Dame de Paris - Live Arena di Verona

2020.overview: Adam Ondra has been considered the best climber in the history of climbing for several years now. Even though he is only 19. Despite the fact that he is studying at a demanding grammar school, he is maybe the most traveling and definitely the most watched climber of today.  It is almost an impossible task to combine and manage top sporting performances on the rocks, a difficult studying and the never ending carousel of competitions, interviews, festivals and slide-shows.  Adam is taking his A level exams in a few weeks. Even though he is a top student, he decides not to go to university. Instead, he and 3 of his friends are setting on a long journey to the unknown north of Europe. Remote areas of Norway and Sweden are hiding some undiscovered climbing and natural treasures.  The first really FREE journey beyond the limits of human possibilities may begin...
2020.title: Change

2020.original_title: TOMORROW X TOGETHER: OUR LOST SUMMER
2020.overview: TOMORROW X TOGETHER are back post-pandemic and are ready to embark on their first world tour from Seoul to North America. The band's nerves and excitement are kicking in, but they have challenged themselves to give the performance of a lifetime.
2020.title: TOMORROW X TOGETHER: OUR LOST SUMMER

2020.original_title: Luccas Neto em: Acampamento de Férias 3
2020.overview: Luccas and Gi are separated for the first time in a competition at the camp. The girls and boys face off in a Talent Show for a spot in a real pop band. The trolling begins! Who's gonna do it best?
2020.title: Luccas Neto in: Summer Camp 3

2021.overview: An ordinary taxi driver has his life turned upside down by picking up an elegant old lady.
2021.title: Taxi

2021.overview: After taking a wrong turn, a young man somehow falls into a mysterious cave and becomes hopelessly lost. As he searches for a way out, the journey he experiences forces him to confront the deepest parts of himself.
2021.title: The Experiencer

2021.overview: A pastor and a teacher, two pillars of the small community of Triune, share a dark and unspeakable secret: the common enemy of an ancient demonic terror deigns to destroy one through the other during the Devil's hour.
2021.title: The Devil's Hour

2021.original_title: Vanessa da Mata: Caixinha de Música Ao Vivo
2021.overview: Vanessa da Mata presents her newest project "Caixinha de Música". Recorded at the Teatro Natura in São Pualo, the project is the second DVD of her career and brings a new musical concept for the singer, in which she brings interference from electronic music incorporating the organic sound of a trio of musicians.
2021.title: Vanessa da Mata: Caixinha de Música Ao Vivo

2021.overview: Danny and older sister Eleanor fall into the adventure of a lifetime when Danny accidentally unleashes a centuries old curse involving mummies, pharaohs and nefarious villains!  When their archaeologist parents go on an expedition to an ancient pharaoh's last resting place, Danny sneaks into the tomb and finds a sacred amulet, which he takes home.  When he accidentally breaks the amulet, all sorts of chaos follows,starting with his parents turning into mummies!  Eleanor and Danny frantically look for clues to solve this nightmare but the police, and evil assistance, and a mysterious visitor from the past are suddenly getting too close for comfort.
2021.title: Under Wraps
